resources.string: Select all three options from the drop down menus below.

This app allows you to generate first and middle names for characters based on regions, time periods, and gender. 

 Begin by adding a project on the project screen. You can add as many projects as you like and delete ones you no longer need by long-pressing on them. 

 Tapping on a project name will take you to an individual page for that project. There you can add and delete individual names. 

 Select an option from each of the three spinners and tap 'Get Names' to see all the names available. Tap a name to choose it. 

 Now, enough jabbering. Add your name below to get started! Happy Choosing!
